message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its exceptional quality and the time invested, I am offering it to you for $8500. I believe this price reflects a fair balance between the value of the product and my expectations for compensation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you've placed on your product. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I can only offer $7500. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your offer. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider $7800 as the price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still compensating for the value and effort invested into the creation of this item.
